description.raw:
Our windows CI machine has been really flaky recently, so I decided to enable appveyor, since this only has one dependency, and it's available with vcpkg.

* The appveyor script is added in 71312e2 and fails because the build is broken on default.
* I fixed the build in 9686b30, by declaring the `Info` struct as visible.
* I then add the `-WX` cxx flag, so it will fail on compiler warnings, and it fails with some DLL_INTERFACE_MISSING warnings in Info.hh
* the warnings are suppressed in 268db43, and the build is clean again

  • I then add the -WX cxx flag, so it will fail on compiler warnings, and it fails with some DLL_INTERFACE_MISSING warnings in Info.hh
  • the warnings are suppressed in 268db43, and the build is clean again
